post.author: 이성기
post.content:
What is your VAJ version? and what size RAM do u have? This is not best idea but I upgraded my PC to 196 RAM and Win2000. I think there is some configuration issue to resolve your problem. I'd like to see English error message. Then we can search the fix on net. for example, www.deja.com
VAJ takes lots of memory basically.
post.title: VAJ takes lots of memory basically.
